messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

unable to close changes snow sent thursday december crook unable close changes snow hello please below incident raise crook about him being able close several changes snow fault raised by crook please contact him if any further information required hi if you can help but following tickets kind stuck limbo can close them there anything can close them down or something you can suggest thanks please log fault your advise reference let know if there any additional information you might need thank you have lovely best regards analyst
